page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SHONA
page.content: I WAKE UP AT 8:00.I GET MY THINGS THAT I NEED FOR SCHOOL AND GO DOWNSTAIRS.I GET WASHED AND DRESSED AND DO MY HAIR.NEXT I HAVE MY BREAKFAST.I GO TO SCHOOL AT 8:45 AND I GET THERE BY 8:50.THEN I GIVE THE REGISTERS OUT.THE BELL GOES AT 9:00.THE REGISTER IS TAKEN AND WE GO INTO ASSEMBLY.EACH FRIDAY THE 3RD AND 4TH YEARS HAVE HYMN PRACTICE.BREAK IS AT 10:30.SUSAN COOK AND I SELL THE CRISPS AND THEN COUNT THE MONEY.BREAK IS OVER AT 10:45.AT 12:00 WE HAVE OUR LUNCH AND A PLAY UNTIL 1:15.AT 1:10 I DO THE REGISTERS AGAIN.AFTERNOON BREAK BEGINS AT 2:30 UNTIL 2:45.EACH TUESDAY,AFTER BREAK,WE VISIT THE BATHS.AT 3:45 IT IS HOME TIME.WHEN I GET HOME I PUT AWAY MY SCHOOL THINGS,GET CHANGED,WATCH THE T.V.OR GO OUT TO PLAY.BED IS AT 9:00 AND I READ FOR 30 MINUTES BEFORE TURNING OFF MY LIGHT.
